text: Anɨb ak tap ñɨŋɨnɨg nop agnɨgɨlɨg, takaw ne anɨb ak nɨgɨlɨg gɨpun tek, God ne ke gek, tap teplep ne anɨb okok mɨdeb, ñɨŋɨnɨgabun.4.5 Jisas ne agak, Tap ñɨŋeb okok mɨdupsek tap teplep mɨdeb, ñɨŋɨnɨmɨb agak. Tap ñɨŋeb olap tap asɨkep agɨl gos ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Aposel 10.9-16 ayɨp Mak 7.19 ayɨp nɨgɨnɨmɨb.
